name: The Space Bar (Moltenhead)
description:
Space Bar : To pass the title screen.

Controls :

left = left arrow / a / q

up = up arrow / z /w

right = right arrow / d

down = down arrow / s

validate = space bar

special = f

In game controls :

up : Pass into "Mixing" mode

  - then left / up / rigth : to select an ingredient

  - space bar: to validate

  - f : to put in some magick pill

  - down : cancel mixing

mash space to finish the cocktail

Goal :

Try to guess and serve the right cocktails to your dear customers. Add in in some magic pills to spice up the result.

The game is not finished but at least I made this in les than 3 days. See you for the next one. :)
